page.title: 12ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: My name is Emily my mummy and daddy are{artists their names are Graham and {Annie Ovenden}and they make a living from it. In Cardinham there are not very many artists. In Mount Jane Dickenson makes{patchwork quilts. Joseph Hewes paints in oils like my mummy and daddy. Mum also does acrylics. My daddy is also a photographer, you can make quite a lot of money being an artist, it depends on how good you are. I asked Joseph Hewes if he like painting - he said "yes, but sometimes I think I will give it up". He does not really know why he likes painting it's just something he has to do. They all sell their things at exhibitions and from home. My dad is a member of the {Ruralists}which hold exhibitions.
